text: Then he said, in a voice with all the warmth and softness of hog bristles.

passages.full_quote: <used>Then he said, in a</used> lower and more urgent tone, "Actually, I don't think I can hang on any longer."
<used>he said, in a voice</used> that did not express much hope

passages.fragment: , in a voice with all the warmth and
passages.full_quote: said Death<used>, in a voice with all the warmth and</used> color of an iceberg

passages.full_quote: It was made from the wool of Ramtop sheep, which had <used>all the warmth and softness of hog bristles</used>
